titles.title: Careful Airport Planning for Southern California Act
To limit the expansion of Los Angeles International Airport.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/16/2002--Introduced. Careful Airport Planning for Southern California Act - Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from approving any revision or modification of the airport layout plan for Los Angeles International Airport if it could result in an increase in the number of air passengers at the airport to a level exceeding 78 million air passengers per year.
